backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing auto-generated short summaries of various frontend project files.
frontend/docs/PLAY_STORE_PUBLISHING.md: Detailed guide for publishing the PWA to Google Play using a TWA wrapper, including required assets, PWA metadata, package naming rules, and setup steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color variables, themes, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: PWA entry HTML defining metadata, icons, fonts, manifest link, and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/assetlinks.j: Digital Asset Links file placeholder mapping an Android app package and SHA-256 fingerprint for TWA verification.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining identity, icons, theme colors, orientation, and start URL for the app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the BattleGame inside a full‑size container.
frontend/src/game/BattleGame.tsx: Main battle game UI managing game state, rendering player, enemies, projectiles, overlays, and background arena.
frontend/src/game/components/GameOverScr: Game over screen showing win/lose state, kill count, and restart button.
frontend/src/game/components/Hud.tsx: Heads-up display component with health bar, kill counter, and pause button.
frontend/src/game/components/PauseOverla: Displays a centered pause overlay with a resume button that triggers onResume.
frontend/src/game/components/StartScreen: Renders the game’s start screen with logo, instructions, start button, and expandable Google Play info.
frontend/src/game/components/TouchContro: Implements a virtual joystick and shoot button using touch events to control movement and firing.
frontend/src/game/TruckGame.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a truck-based game mode.
frontend/src/game/useBattleGame.ts: Provides the main battle game loop, managing state, movement, projectiles, enemies, collisions, and win/lose conditions.
frontend/src/game/useTruckGame.ts: Empty placeholder file for a truck game hook.
frontend/src/game/utils/collision.ts: Contains a simple distance‑based collision check function.
frontend/src/game/utils/spawn.ts: Defines enemy spawn timing and generates enemies at arena edges while avoiding proximity to the player.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading identity, handling login, and exposing status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty module noting that no backend queries are required for the game.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, base layout rules, and custom game-specific styles like arena gradients, glow effects, and shadows.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, configuring React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors linked to CSS variables, extended theme settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including scope, architecture notes, known issues, and a list of existing feature definitions with requirement mappings.
